plugin.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Uploaders Options]
plugin.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Options shared by all uploaders plugins]

global_param.name: UPLOAD_MAX_SIZE
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[File Size]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Maximum size per file allowed to upload.]

global_param.name: ALLOWED_EXTENSIONS
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Extensions List]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Filter the files that are allowed to be uploaded, by extensions. Use a comma-separated list.]

global_param.name: ALLOWED_EXTENSIONS_READABLE
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Ext. Label]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[User readable label for the list of allowed extensions (images, all files, etc).]

global_param.name: MULTIPART_UPLOAD_THRESHOLD
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Multipart Threshold]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Switch to Multipart Upload for files bigger than this value (in bytes)]

global_param.name: MULTIPART_UPLOAD_PART_SIZE
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Multipart Parts Size]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Chunk Size used for multipart uploads, it must be a multiple of 10MB for hashing consistency. If you plan to upload very large files (bigger 500GB), raise this value to lower the total number of parts sent.]

global_param.name: MULTIPART_UPLOAD_QUEUE_SIZE
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Queue Size]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Number of concurrent uploads (maximum 6, due to browsers limitations)]

global_param.name: MULTIPART_UPLOAD_TIMEOUT_MINUTES
global_param.label: CONF_MESSAGE[Timeout]
global_param.description: CONF_MESSAGE[Request Timeout (in minutes) for each concurrent part upload]
